definition: shuanggui, an extralegal system within the CCP for detaining and interrogating cadres who fall from grace

sentences.english: A concept of bi-normalized response spectra was presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了双规准反应谱的概念。

sentences.english: Song Siming was later supervised by the police due to his corruption and embezzlement and died due to car accident.
sentences.chinese: 而宋思明最后也因为贪污等原因被双规，翻车身亡。

sentences.english: We have a two-tier education system: private and public.
sentences.chinese: 我们实行的是双规教育制度，公立制和私立制学校。

definition: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection (CCDI), organization within the CCP which investigates corruption and other wrongdoing among Party cadres/abbr. for 中共中央紀律檢查委員會|中共中央纪律检查委员会
to relieve sb of his post/to sack/to demote/dismissal/sacking
deferred death sentence/commuted death sentence with forced labor and judicial review after two years (PRC) (legal)
Communist Party official whose wife and children have left China to reside in a foreign country
lack of discipline/to break a rule/to violate discipline/to breach a principle
to bend the law in order to favor one's relatives or associates (idiom)

to eliminate/to sack/to remove from office
